tool_description: Retrieves and manages the complete state of a shopping cart including all items, quantities, and metadata.

cart_id.description: Unique identifier for the shopping cart

include_pricing.description: Whether to include pricing information in the state

include_metadata.description: Whether to include cart metadata (creation date, last modified, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid cart ID: Provide a valid cart identifier.
Cart not found: No cart exists with the specified ID.
Access denied: Unable to access cart state due to permission restrictions.
State retrieval failed: System error occurred while retrieving cart state.
usage: Provide cart_id to retrieve current cart state. Optionally include pricing and metadata information by setting the respective boolean flags.

item_ids.description: Array of item IDs currently in the cart

quantities.description: Array of quantities corresponding to each item

total_items.description: Total number of unique items in cart
